response.original_title: How do I cancel Geek Squad auto renewal? [[USA~Quick~Guide]]
response.overview: To cancel Geek Squad auto renewal, call the toll-free number 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 for immediate assistance. You can also use 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 during business hours to speak with a representative and stop the subscription. Simply dial 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638, follow the prompts, and confirm cancellation. For any issues, contact 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 again to ensure your plan is deactivated. Lastly, keep 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 handy for future inquiries about Geek Squad services.
